cards.title: Microsoft brings project-focused AI agents into OneDrive
tldr_bullets: **Microsoft introduces AI agents in OneDrive to enhance project management capabilities.**
These AI agents assist users in organizing and managing project-related files effectively.
Ideal for teams looking to streamline project workflows and improve collaboration.

cards.title: Wrike agents: No-code AI for supercharged productivity
tldr_bullets: **No-code AI agents designed to enhance productivity for PMO teams.**
Integrates seamlessly with existing workflows to streamline project management tasks.
Ideal for automating routine processes and improving project delivery efficiency.

The platform streamlines processes for various industries.
It can benefit PMO teams by improving project efficiency and communication.

tldr_bullets: **AI readiness checklist enhances strategic planning for manufacturers.**

cards.title: RAF-led Project BOYD to explore AI-driven planning
tldr_bullets: **AI-driven planning aims to enhance military decision-making efficiency.**
Project BOYD will utilize AI to streamline command and control processes.
The initiative focuses on improving commanders' information processing and operational decisions.

cards.title: Anthropic debuts Claude Cowork plugins to help users automate more tasks
tldr_bullets: Automation tool applicable to PMO workflows for enhancing task efficiency and reducing manual effort.
Users can create custom plugins to tailor Claude Cowork for specific project management tasks.
Ideal for teams needing to automate document handling and data visualization in project execution.

cards.title: From LLMs to Agents: How BigID is Enabling Secure Agentic AI for Data Governance
tldr_bullets: Agentic AI applicable to PMO data governance and compliance processes, enhancing decision-making efficiency.
Integrate BigID's Agentic Automation App to streamline data discovery and governance workflows for project management.
Useful for PMOs seeking to automate compliance and improve data-driven insights across enterprise projects.

cards.title: Automating TDD: Using AI to Generate Edge-Case Unit Tests
tldr_bullets: AI-driven testing tool applicable to PMO software development processes for enhanced code reliability.
Implement a 'Threat-Model-First' workflow to identify edge cases before coding begins.
Useful for teams aiming to improve software quality and reduce bugs in project deliverables.

cards.title: 6 async practices that surface buried insights (and how AI can help)
tldr_bullets: **Intentional async practices can uncover vital knowledge for teams**.
AI can assist in gathering and summarizing existing insights effectively.
Useful for teams to prevent duplicate work and enhance decision-making.

cards.title: Inside Google's 'Project EAT' That Is Supercharging Employees With AI
tldr_bullets: AI initiative designed for PMO employee productivity and technology adoption across teams.
Project EAT encourages standardized AI tool usage to enhance operational efficiency.
Useful for PMOs aiming to integrate AI capabilities into project management workflows.

cards.title: ServiceNow and Anthropic Disclose AI Deal
tldr_bullets: AI agent builder with potential PMO applications in workflow automation across various industries.
ServiceNow's integration of Claude models can enhance project delivery through AI-assisted workflows.
Useful for PMOs looking to streamline processes in healthcare and IT service management.

cards.title: Scale AI in South Africa using Amazon Bedrock global cross-Region inference with Anthropic Claude 4.5 models
tldr_bullets: Global cross-Region inference with Amazon Bedrock could support PMO resource optimization and scalability.
Utilize AWS Identity and Access Management for configuring permissions and invoking models effectively.
Ideal for PMOs in South Africa managing AI applications with enhanced throughput during peak usage.

cards.title: Mentorship in Modern Engineering Teams: The ROI Question in the Age of AI
tldr_bullets: Mentorship strategies applicable to PMO team development and junior engineer integration.
Implement structured mentorship programs to enhance junior engineers' skills and team stability.
Useful for PMOs aiming to improve junior talent retention and productivity in an AI-driven environment.
